name: The Witchcraft of Skysword - 天翔と剣のウィッチクラフト
description: "The Witchcraft of Skysword" is a flying 2D action game! You will beat a lot of enemies coolly! And break the bosses!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit) Processor: SSE2(Pentium 4 or later) Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
